summary: A confidential memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 13, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76301-054). It states that certain psychology externs in the psychology department did not have any contact with Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the memorandum, identified as inmate #76301-054 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: The document is a confidential government memorandum regarding Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration.
It is dated August 13, 2019, which is two days after Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell.
The memo states that certain psychology externs in the facility's psychology department did not have any contact with Epstein.
The document is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files, numbered SDNY_00009149 and EFTA00123210.
